String.string: Thulsa wants this to crush morale, so keep it quiet.

We amani were born to be slaves!

Look for General Kanmur in the Ebon Tower and dispatch him. [You must select Ebon Tower (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:251#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Report to Kesarik in the cave near Ebon Tower.
